name: actor_bot
description: True/False if the event actor is a bot or not from SortingHat profile.

name: actor_domain
description: Event actor domain name from SortingHat profile.

name: actor_gender
description: Event actor gender, based on her name, from SortingHat (disabled by default).

name: actor_gender_acc
description: Event actor gender accuracy from SortingHat (disabled by default).

name: actor_id
description: Event actor ID from SortingHat profile.

name: actor_name
description: Event actor name from SortingHat profile.

name: actor_org_name
description: Event actor organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: actor_multi_org_names
description: List of the actor organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: actor_user_name
description: Event actor username from SortingHat profile.

name: actor_uuid
description: Event actor UUID from SortingHat profile.

name: author_bot
description: True/False if the event author is a bot or not from SortingHat profile.

name: author_domain
description: Event actor domain name from SortingHat profile.

name: author_gender
description: Event actor gender, based on her name, from SortingHat (disabled by default).

name: author_gender_acc
description: Event actor gender accuracy from SortingHat (disabled by default).

name: author_id
description: Event actor ID from SortingHat profile.

name: author_name
description: Event actor name from SortingHat profile.

name: author_org_name
description: Event actor organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: author_multi_org_names
description: List of the actor organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: author_user_name
description: Event actor username from SortingHat profile.

name: author_uuid
description: Event actor UUID from SortingHat profile.

name: board_closed_at
description: Date when the board was closed.

name: board_column
description: Name of the column where the issue is.

name: board_created_at
description: Date when the board was created.

name: board_name
description: Name of the board.

name: board_previous_column
description: Name of the previous column where the issue was.

name: board_state
description: State of the board (open/closed).

name: board_updated_at
description: Date when the board was updated.

name: board_url
description: URL of the board.

name: closer_closed
description: True/False if the pull request is closed or not.

name: closer_closed_at
description: Date when the pull request was closed.

name: closer_created_at
description: Date when the pull request was created.

name: closer_event_url
description: URL where the closed event occurred.

name: closer_event_url
description: True/False if the pull request is merged or not.

name: closer_number
description: Number of the pull request.

name: closer_repo
description: Repository of the pull request.

name: closer_type
description: Type of the closer object (currently only pull requests are processed).

name: closer_updated_at
description: Date when the pull request was updated.

name: closer_url
description: URL of the pull request.

name: created_at
description: Date when the event was created.

name: duration_from_previous_event
description: Duration in days from the previous event (added by duration analysis study).

name: event_type
description: Type of the event processed.

name: github_repo
description: GitHub repository name of the issue.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Pull Request creation date.

name: is_github_issue
description: Used to separate issues from other items such as pull requests.

name: issue_closed_at
description: Date when the issue was closed.

name: issue_created_at
description: Date when the issue was opened.

name: issue_id
description: Issue's ID in GitHub.

name: id_in_repo
description: The issue's ID in the repository it was created.

name: issue_labels
description: The labels assigned to an issue.

name: issue_state
description: State of the item (open/closed).

name: issue_updated_at
description: Date when the issue was last updated.

name: issue_url_id
description: Consists of the project path and the issue's id.

name: issue_url
description: Full URL of the issue.

name: item_type
description: The type of the item (issue/pull request).

name: label
description: Label name.

name: label_description
description: Label description.

name: label_created_at
description: Date when the label was created.

name: label_is_default
description: True/False whether the label is a GitHub default one.

name: label_updated_at
description: Date when the label was updated.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the data were enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich the data.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich the data.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in ElasticSearch raw index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated on its original data source.

name: origin
description: The original URL from which the repository was retrieved from.

name: previous_event_uuid
description: Previous event uuid (added by duration analysis study).

name: project_1
description: Used if more than one project levels are allowed in the project hierarchy.

name: project
description: Project name.

name: pull_request
description: True/False if the item is a pull request or not.

name: reference_will_close_target
description: True/False if the target will be closed when the source is merged.

name: reference_cross_repo
description: True/False if the reference originated in a different repository.

name: reference_event_url
description: URL of the reference event.

name: reference_source_closed
description: True/False if the source is closed or not.

name: reference_source_closed_at
description: Date when the source was closed.

name: reference_source_created_at
description: Date when the source was created.

name: reference_source_merged
description: True/False if the source was merged or not.

name: reference_source_number
description: Number of the source.

name: reference_source_repo
description: Repo of the source.

name: reference_source_type
description: Type of the source (issue/pull request).

name: reference_source_updated_at
description: Date when the source was updated.

name: reference_source_url
description: URL of the source.

name: repository
description: Repository name.

name: repository_labels
description: Custom repository labels defined by the user.

name: tag
description: Perceval tag.

name: title
description: The title of the Pull Request.

name: title_analyzed
description: Pull Request title split by terms to allow searching.

name: uuid
description: Perceval UUID.
